
```{r}
taxmap_df = read.table('taxmap_slv_lsu_ref_138.1.txt', sep="\t", fill=TRUE, header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
head(taxmap_df)
```

```{r}
path_taxid = as.data.frame(cbind(taxmap_df$path,taxmap_df$taxid))
head(path_taxid)
names(path_taxid)[1] = "path"
names(path_taxid)[2] = "taxid"
```

```{r}
#sort and remove duplicates
taxid = path_taxid$taxid
path_taxid_sorted <- path_taxid[order(as.numeric(taxid)),]
library(dplyr)
path_taxid_unique <- path_taxid_sorted %>% distinct(taxid, .keep_all = TRUE)
path_taxid_unique
write.table(path_taxid_unique, 'path_and_taxid.txt', row.names = FALSE, col.names = TRUE, sep="\t", quote = FALSE )
```
